content: Hello! I started learning Rust about a year ago and already started missing the borrow checker in other languages. I'm interested in learning how the Rust compiler works and I'd like to contribute more than doc comments for From implementations (yes, I'm talking about https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/51430) when I'm ready and see an opportunity. As my Rust experience is pretty limited and I know basically nothing about the compiler (I'll read the rustc dev guide next) this is likely going to take a while.
Nothing negligible about (Try)From doccomment contributions! A bunch of them being non-allocating and such is incredibly important to have documented.
I'll keep doing that :smile:
